title: Introduction
breadcrumbs: Version 2.1 New features, improvements and updates
text:
Introduction

We are proud to present the new release of devonfw, version "2.1" which weâ€™ve baptized "Balu". A major focus for this release is developer productivity. So that explains the name, as Balu is not just big, friendly and cuddly but also was very happy to let Mowgli do the work for him.
